entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • system.Diagnostics.Metrics does add my counter in the instrument in case of dotnet MAUI applicaiton when running android emulator using OpenTelemetry #21165
  • [BUG] Setting MapType to MapType.Hybrid for Windows does not display street labels with the map #21163
  • [Docs] Add docs about CarouselView changes in MAUI that doesn't allow you to bind a list of views as an ItemSource #21161
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Null Pointer Crash in KeyboardAutoScrollManager.AdjustPosition #21160
  • MAUI Windows application not navigating when app not in focus. #21158
    Backlog
  • Selecting a link/button in a WebView MAUI app for IOS fails and unexpectedly shuts down app. #21157
  • Text of Shell MenuItem not visible in ReleaseMode on Android #21155
  • Finished creating package, but nothing package found #21153
  • [Android][Handler/Layout Engine] Custom Entry with TextInputLayout won't respect layout width #21150
  • [Android] android:requiredFeature="false" permissions not working #21149
    Backlog
  • Memory raising when using flyout navigation #21147
  • Page weak reference is still alive after pushing and popping pages modally or normally #21143

Closed

  • Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #15802
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView on main is broken on WIndows #21001
    .NET 8 SR4
  • 'IsEnable' property is not working with trigger in Button control #21148
  • UNABLE TO UPDATE SPLASH SCREEN - iOS - Local Dv #21154
  • After rotating the emulator from horizontal to vertical orientation, the card of page My Recipes is truncated. #16850
    Backlog
  • WinUI crash at shell navigation #20514
    Backlog
  • Android NavigationPage in inconsistent state if Push/Pop operations are performed sometime after app deactivation #16441
    Backlog
  • [Android] When device locked/using another app, if Navigation occurs it will fail and leave the app in a broken state #21113
  • CSC : warning CS8785: Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source #20232

PullRequests

Created

  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
  • [DRAFT] Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #21152
    do-not-merge
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #21151
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #21146
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 branch #21145
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Update Win2D #21144
  • Update Windows App SDK #21162
  • [Windows] Round item size in GridView #21142
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix UI loop when setting ContentInset #21140
  • [Catalyst] Fix Image not rendering in Mac Idiom (Device family = 6) Button #21048
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, control-button
  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
